questions.text: What is one thing you would change about yourself if you could?

followUp.text: Can you give me an example of a situation in which you wish you had been more assertive?
What do you think was preventing you from being more assertive in that situation?

questions.response: You have a desire to improve yourself and become more confident in your physical appearance.

questions.text: What are some things that make you feel bad about yourself?

followUp.text: Can you give me an example of a recent time you felt bad about yourself?
What steps have you taken to try to overcome these feelings?

questions.response: You have a desire to improve yourself and become more confident in your physical appearance.

questions.text: What is something that you have always wanted to try but have been too afraid to?

followUp.text: What specifically are you afraid of when it comes to trying this thing?
What steps can you take to overcome this fear and try this thing?

questions.response: You have a desire to improve yourself and become more confident in your physical appearance.
